API Interface of OrbitDB¶

The OrbitDB interface.

class OrbitDB(ipfs, identity, options)¶

OrbitDB instance

OrbitDB.databaseTypes¶

Returns supported database types as an Array of strings Eg. [ ‘counter’, ‘eventlog’, ‘feed’, ‘docstore’, ‘keyvalue’]

OrbitDB._haveLocalData(cache, dbAddress)¶

Check if we have the database, or part of it, saved locally

Arguments

  • cache (Array.<Cache>) – [The OrbitDBCache instance containing the local data]

  • dbAddress (Array.<OrbitDBAddress>) – [Address of the database to check]

Returns

Array.<Boolean> – [Returns true if we have cached the db locally, false if not]

OrbitDB._migrate(Object, OrbitDBAddress)¶

Runs all migrations inside the src/migration folder

Arguments

  • Object – options Options to pass into the migration

  • OrbitDBAddress – dbAddress Address of database in OrbitDBAddress format

OrbitDB.feed(address)¶

Load or create a new feed database

Arguments

  • address (OrbitDBAddress|string) – or name of the database to open/create

OrbitDB.createInstance(ipfs, options)¶

Return an instance of OrbitDB given an IPFS or HTTP-IPFS-Client

Arguments

  • ipfs – the js-ipfs instance or ipfshttpclient instance

  • options – several options

Returns

instance of orbitdb

OrbitDB
